name: Kenka Bancho Otome
description: Kenka Bancho Otome (喧嘩番長乙女) is an upcoming otome game, developed Red Entertainment Corporation and published by Spike Chunsoft for Playstation Vita. The game is an otome game spin-off of Kenka Bancho series, and is scheduled to be released on May 19, 2016. A manga was released ahead of the game, on July 4th, 2015, and entitled Kenka Bancho Otome ～Koi no Battle Royal～.
